member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to login to session state SQL server for user '{0}'..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Attribute not recognized '{0}'.
